name: Development Initiative for South Asians
short_description:
DISA works to connect the development professionals as well as organizations to leverage opportunities and communicate faster to deliver the results. Our work is guided by our objective ‘Discover, Connect and Share for the Better World in South Asian perspective’.
DISA has had an aim to build partnership with the organization for mutual interest to provide online support for their events. We have been working towards building a holistic resource portal for the Development Sector, providing information on jobs, trainings, events, Grants and funds, project proposals, internship and volunteering opportunities, fellowships and useful resources for Development professionals of South Asian with simplest way who are mostly deserve that.
summary: A resources portal for development professionals
